description: This file implements state management for a chat application using React Context and useReducer hook. It defines types for messages, conversations, and actions, and provides context providers and hooks for managing chat state within the React component tree.

methods.name: ChatProvider
methods.description: Provides chat state and dispatch function to React component tree via context.

methods.name: useChat
methods.description: Custom hook to access chat context (state and dispatch).

methods.name: getActiveConversation
methods.description: Returns the currently active conversation based on state.

methods.name: getMessagesForConversation
methods.description: Retrieves all messages associated with a specific conversation.
